lexUnit.name: chain.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: fasten, secure, or confine with a chain

sentence.text: But in another experiment 50 two-ton concrete slabs are to be chained together and dumped from a huge tilting steel platform about 6,750 ft above sea level .
Ultimately , Zeus overcame his father and chained him to a rock midway between the earth and sea .
Last time I let you make friends , you chained me to a table .
The torturers had chained him to a wall , applying searing hot pokers to the softest and most tender parts of his body .
Four activists chained themselves to an oil drilling rig being towed to the Barents Sea in early August , and several days later others steered a boat into the 500-metre safety zone around the rig .
She rode up and chained her bicycle to tall railings .
Chain your steering wheel to the clutch , brake pedal or a seat .
I chained my bicycle to the railings and climbed the north-facing steps , slimy with moss , where the puddles never dried .
Wedgwood insisted on hygiene practices to limit the danger from lead used in pot glazing , and some Sheffield masters chained a protective guard over their wheels , but these were exceptional .
He was chained to a rock and his liver , though continually devoured by an eagle , never diminished .
Carson started to climb the stairs , passing some stacks of yellow newsprint and a bicycle which was chained to the rotting wood of the balustrade , before turning and starting up the next flight .
They are chained to walls or to their beds .
At the Raja 's insistence Tara was chained up to a 500 year old tree .
Even as she chained her bike up she noticed three different taxis drawing up and depositing their customers .
They chained a cargo train to the rail tracks that lead to the US company 's production complex .
The only difference was that many of the cars were big limousines , in contrast to the bikes and the pieces of bikes chained to railings that were her last , hazy recollection of the hospital .
And Miss Streep duly arrived on her bicycle which she chained confidently to the theatre railings .
The second cell ( 82c ) contains a moaning , naked Orc chained down on a bed of nails which rip the boil-infested flesh on his back .
